siteMetadata.title: Shilpi Agrawal
siteMetadata.subtitle: Blog of poems, experiences, product management, personal opinions

frontmatter.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Gurgaon!
frontmatter.description: This is a short personal note I wrote when I moved to Bangalore from Gurgaon. Gurgaon, of course, has always topped the pollution charts but this note summarizes what it meant for me.
